meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Randy Cauthen Elisabeth Carrel Sarah Curtis Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6346.

td.p: Randy Cauthen, a poet and professor originally from Charleston, South Carolina
Elisabeth Carrel, a copy editor from Elgin, Illinois
Sarah Curtis, a mechanical and electrical drafter from Oceanside, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,000)

tr.td: A BEASTLY CATEGORY
APPROXIMATE WEIGHTS & MEASURES
CRITIQUING SHAKESPEARE
E FOLLOWS F
HUSBANDS
GREAT JANES

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

silkworms

Randy
')
